channel.title: How i put skillcape to 99
channel.description:
I would like to know how i put skillcape for a skillz 99 because i create a client and there is some skillcape on it. But there is not 99 for it.
How i fix all these for a skillz 99?

item.title: How i put skillcape to 99
item.dc:creator: @Destroyed_32 Destroyed 32
item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

He mean, that he want that SkillCapes can just bought from People who have this Skill 99!

I don’t know the Code at the moment(where people can just buy with skill 99), but when i find it i will tell it you

And with the other, there just delete the line what i posted with “case 15 // Herblore” etc. Than they won’t get the SkillCape when he get Level 99

MfG, Dest

Read full topic

And i put this in what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2008, 07:40:16 am[/size][hr]But i mean I have devolution v7.0 and i don’t want when people get a 99 skillz they receive a skillcape. I want to put skillcape to 99.

item.title: How i put skillcape to 99
item.dc:creator: @Destroyed_32 Destroyed 32
item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

Here, you need this:

[code] case 15: // Herblore

        sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a herblore level.");
        // NpcDialogueSend = true;
        if (playerLevel[15] >= 99) {
            addItem(14100, 1);
            addItem(14101, 1);
            addItem(14102, 1);               
            sendMessage(
                    "Congratulations, you just recived the herblore skill cape and hood!");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten "
                    + playerLevel[15] + " herblore!");[/code]

I hope it help

MfG, Dest

EDIT//
If your HERBLORE SKILLCAPE have another number than mine, than just change it!

Read full topic
